Key Match Events: Brady Singer pitched six strong innings for the Royals.
Kyle Isbel hit a bases-clearing double to give the Royals a lead.
Lucas Erceg and Vinnie Pasquantino were injured on the same play in the eighth inning.
Mauricio Dubón hit a two-run single to extend the Astros' lead.
Post-Match Reflections: Royals manager Matt Quatraro commented on Erceg's injury, noting he was in too much pain to continue.
John Schreiber reflected on his performance, stating he tried to execute his pitches in a tough situation.
Brady Singer expressed satisfaction with his pitching performance, highlighting the effectiveness of his sinker and slider.
